title.rendered: Gujarat vs Punjab, Indian First-Class Trophy 2022: Today’s Match Preview, Fantasy Cricket Tips

content.rendered:
We have opted for a fantasy cricket team based on the recent performances, overall impact, and credit points.

Probable XIs

Gujarat: Kathan Patel, Priyank Panchal (c), Saurav Chauhan, Het Patel (wk), Priyesh Patel, Hardik Patel, Manan Hingrajia, Siddharth Desai, Chintan Gaja, Shen Patel, Umang Kumar

Punjab: Abhishek Sharma, Prabhsimran Singh, Naman Dhir, Mandeep Singh (c), Ramandeep Singh , Sanvir Singh, Anmol Malhotra (wk), Siddarth Kaul, Vinay Choudhary/Mayank Markande, Gurnoor Brar, Baltej Singh

Pitch Report

Venue: Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel Stadium, Valsad

(Based on the last 2 Tests; both ended in a draw)

1st innings average score: 335

2nd innings average score: 369

3rd innings average score: 107

4th innings average score: 196

Type: Good for pace. The wicket is likely to become dry as the game progresses.

Weather: Clear

Fantasy Tips of the Day

Between these teams, Priyank Panchal has collected the most fantasy points this season. He has added 505 runs, including 2 fifties and 2 hundreds in only 3 games.

On the other hand, Punjab’s batting revolves around the duo of Mandeep Singh and Prabhsimran Singh. The duo has added two hundreds and a fifty between them.

In the bowling category, Siddharth Desai tops the chart. His 21 wickets comprise of a four-for and two five-fors. For Punjab, Siddharth Kaul has been the wrecker-in-chief. The conditions suit his style of bowling.
